FuncDef: The display vlanpvc-to-username command displays the version of the user name binding format.
Examples: Version of vlan and pvc model in username : Version2.0
ExtraInfo: The display vlanpvc-to-username command displays the version of the user name binding format. The user name format varies with the version. That is, the format of Nas-Port-ID that the NE40E sends to the RADIUS server is different. For details, see the description document for the RADIUS attribute.
